page.title: 08 HATT FARM, KINGSDOWN.
page.content: { Hatt Farm}is near Kingsdown golf course,and is rented by Mr. and Mrs. Pope .They also own a farm called {Norbin Barton Farm,}and rent land at {Kingsdown, Closes and Lodge Farms. Altogether, the Popes farm 700 acres in our survey area.The house is 137 years old but the Popes themselves have lived there for 12 years.The crops they grow are{wheat,winter {barley and}rape.They also own{Hereford {Cross Fresian}cattle.In World War 2 a {dummy runway}was made there to stop German bombers landing at the Colerne base. { The Roman road}crosses one of Mr. Pope's fields.{Pylons}from the power station in South Wales to Melksham sometimes get in the way of the farm machinery.A house called the{Old {Jockey}is nearby-this was a{pub}and a {hideout}for{poachers}and{highwaymen.
